overview:
A serial entrepreneur, investor and expert in big data, social business intelligence, information security and privacy, Vince’s unique expertise spans several industries as a pioneer of landmark innovations and revolutionary technologies. His achievements include leading four companies to successful exits.

Currently, Vince serves as Co-Founder and CEO of AKUDA LABS (akuda.com), a world-class pioneer in disruptive big data processing. AKUDA LABS’ proprietary Pulsar platform delivers real-time, big streaming data processing capabilities at 500 million streaming classification operations per second (SCOPS) on a path to 1+ billion per second, delivering exponential speed at a fractional cost compared to general-purpose solutions.

Vince also serves as Co-Founder and CEO of ListenLogic (ListenLogic.com), the industry’s leading social business intelligence solution for Fortune 500s looking for actionable, real-time insight and deep, powerful analytics from social media chaos to manage risk and engage opportunities. ListenLogic was launched largely to prove the robust, real-time, big streaming data capabilities of AKUDA LABS’ Pulsar platform.

For more on Vince visit: linkedin.com/in/VincentSchiavone
